name: MEC 3D Forged 350mm Seat Post (15mm Offset)
description: Upgrade your bike with swanky, sharp looking seat post. The one-piece design is solid, easy to adjust and hits the sweet spot on price/quality continuum.Made of a single piece of forged 6061-T6 aluminum.2-bolt design is easy to adjust and holds rails securely.Butted tube optimizes the strength-to-weight ratio.Offset is 15mm, length is 350mm.
